Title: Al-Fatiha
Plot: A federal agent goes undercover in Los Angeles to try and infiltrate a group of Islamic terrorists.  Darwyn al-hakim finds an Islamic extremist guy named Farik. Farik asks him the join Sleeper Cell's plan to attack Los Angeles.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language, sex scenes and content that may disturb
Director: Clark Johnson, Melissa Sagemiller, Luis Chavez, Jame
GuestStars: Gary Levine, Stephen Mendel, Zsa Zsa Modjallal, Sahra Silanne, Jake Soldera, John Wesley Chatman, Lala Khanian
